statement: Possible non-targeted effects of Orco knockout using CRISPR/Cas9 should be analyzed and evaluated in the methodology and results sections.
In the chemical analysis experiments, the compounds tested have no volatiles derived from plants, despite cruciferous plants having well-known mustard bomb compounds.
The custom-made multichannel arena setup and the relevant behavioral experiments need to be described in detail in the methodology.
10 μL paraffin oil should be used for negative control in the experimental design.

The experiments with parasitoids would be carried out on a single plant with caterpillars very limited in their potential movement and source of food, making it unclear whether avoidance played a role in the results or if it was simply the slower growth of the KO caterpillars extending their period of susceptibility, which is important since only one mechanism suggests a direct role of olfaction in enemy avoidance while the other is an indirect effect.
